Class UIButton

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Button
          UIButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
HoverInfo
public class UIButton
extends Button
implements HoverInfo

A class to simplify the removal of specific buttons
Easier to call remove (UIButton.class) instead of
Remove (___.class), remove (___.class), remove (___.class), etc

Version:
(1.0)
Author:
(James Lu)
